question: Which country is geographically associated with "Nakwakto Rapids"?
explanation: Nakwakto Rapids is one of the fastest tidal rapids in the world. And, it is located in the Seymour Inlet of Canada. Seymour Inlet has two parts-(a). Slingsby Channel and (b). Schooner Channel. Nakwakto Rapids flows though the Slingsby Channel. These rapids flow at speeds up to 18.4 miles per hour.
